attributes.action: Greater UN intervention/presence in countries with dictatorship/corruption - to help build infrastructure/jobs & reverse the need for charity/asylum
attributes.additional_details:
Corrupt foreign "goverments" which steal charity funds/resources intended for local people - need to be rooted out. There needs to be a strong will from the International Community (with our UK government pushing for this).

The UN requires a presence on the ground and needs to be involved in the "dishing out" of funds to local people/ventures - to help produce local jobs.
Thus helping to stem the tide of asylum seekers.
All public & private money raised in the UK should be SENT TO THE UN - (freeing up UK Admin & work required, saving money) and administered by the UN as a collective organisation - together with the money raised by other countries. This should be backed up by UN military to enforce correct distribution.

Net effect is help towards solving asylum seeking issue; a reduction in UK public money sent overseas; & privately raised charity money redirected internally to other very important causes.
